name: Akeyro's Tweetdeck V0.1.1
description:
First part of my Tweetdeck userstyle
Better looking with the Dark Theme

More to come in the near future !

For Google Chrome, please use the Mozilla Format import tool
additional_info:
Changelog :

0.1.1 : - Fixed square avatar on the user's profil avatar

Added : 
- Round Avatars
- Animation when hovering Avatar
- Text shadow when hovering Tweet/Username (Borrowed from TinaDeck : https://userstyles.org/styles/115698/tinadeck-special-lovewins-edition )
